Text: How do you turn it to english?
how do you make it english!!!?

oh shit i found out how to make it english.

 go to the Bin32 folder and then locate to skidrow.ini. double click it, run with notepad if you have to and change the language to russian. hope it helped.

TO MAKE IT ENGLISH
-------------------------
Go to the Bin32 folder and find SKIDROW.ini. Then just change the language to english. Hope this helped.
